SEARCH
Package com.walletapp.model

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.walletapp.model.Account
public class Account extends Object
Represents a financial account of a user. Stores information such as account name, type, initial balance, currency, color, whether it should be excluded from statistics, and creation timestamp.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account()
      Default no-argument constructor.

    • Account

      public Account(Integer id, Integer userId, String name, String accountType, BigDecimal initialBalance, String currency, String color, Boolean excludeFromStats, LocalDateTime createdAt)
      Parameterized constructor to create an account with all details.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the account.
      userId - ID of the user owning this account.
      name - Name of the account.
      accountType - Type of the account.
      initialBalance - Initial balance of the account.
      currency - Currency used for this account.
      color - Color code for UI representation.
      excludeFromStats - Whether to exclude from statistics.
      createdAt - Account creation timestamp.
